item.title: [Python] I tried to make an image similarity function with Python + OpenCV
item.description: ## Overview A memo when I made a function to compare a certain image with multiple images with a grayscale histogram in Python Environment Python 2.7.9 Pyenv anaconda-2.1.0 opencv 2.4.8 (installed with conda) Implementation import cv2 def matching(self): im = cv2.imread('/to/image/path/image.jpg', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE) # ImageFile to compare image_hist = cv2.calcHist([im], [0], None, [256], [0, 256]) target = self.compare_target_hist(image_hist) result = [] while True: try: result.
